Completed

The Lore:

Started learning programming in college with the C++ language.

Found an interest in the art of programming, wanted to do more.

Started learning python and LUA then later got introduced to web development.

Started learning .HTML and .CSS, later then PHP and MySQL as the backend choice.

Wanted to delve more into app development, Laravel became the main choice framework.

I later then switched and focused more in the front end as my apps looked rather stiff and boring.

Played around with canvas and later, web trasitions, gsap and three.js.

As time progress so as my skills and knowledge in web development.

Most of my work are on display at my github,
and some are visually displayed at the work section in this site that you can access.
